comment._content: Looks like a girl to me.

comment.author: 34903742@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/elithebearded] It was quite common to dress boys as girls at this time. I'm not sure when the "normal" gender-specific clothes would begin to be worn, but I suspect it would be around the time a child started formal schooling.

comment.author: 17264356@N00
comment._content: Hmm. Okay, I can believe that. -- Seen in my recent comments. (?)
